title: Peigal Jaakkirathai (2016)
overview: Saravanan, who has suicidal tendencies, becomes part of Annachi's household as the latter, who has a fear of ghosts, believes that he will help him get rid of it. But the young man has a near-death experience after which he starts seeing ghosts!
storyline: One person who panics even to the word ghost and another person who strongly believes that ghosts do not exist, meet at a point in life. How they interchange their opinions and do they arrive at a common conclusion is what is hilariously told in this movie.
